name: Mahjong Linker: Kyodai game
description:
In this Kyodai game, you must link Mahjong tiles with 3 lines maximum.
This free game is a good mix of puzzle game and speed. You must think wisely, but you have to be fast because you have limited time to finish each level.

This game is 100% free / gratis. Play now !

FEATURES
- Superb graphisms
- 12 levels
- Different gameplays
- Numerous tiles
- Bonuses
- a lot of fun
